Machine Learning.name: Machine Learning Crash Course (Google)
Machine Learning.description: A beginner-friendly ML course with hands-on TensorFlow exercises. Covers key ML concepts with real-world applications.

Machine Learning.name: Kaggle Learn
Machine Learning.description: Free ML courses with interactive coding exercises. Great for learning ML while working on real datasets and competitions.

Machine Learning.name: Fast.ai
Machine Learning.description: Practical deep learning and ML courses. Focuses on hands-on learning with PyTorch for real-world applications.

Machine Learning.name: Scikit-Learn Documentation
Machine Learning.description: The official docs for one of the most popular ML libraries. Covers algorithms, examples, and practical implementations.

Machine Learning.name: Stanford CS229 (Machine Learning by Andrew Ng)
Machine Learning.description: One of the most in-depth ML courses from Stanford. Covers theoretical and practical ML concepts.
